name: Green walk (the totally normal walking sim)
name_original: Green walk (the totally normal walking sim)
description:
Note:

This is my first-ever game. Thus it is of course not perfect. Nonetheless, I spent about 2 months working on this. I am an aspiring game creator and every tiny bit of feedback keeps me going. Really be honest. Tell me about each flaw so that I can improve it in my next one. Thank you so much for visiting this page and I hope you enjoy this game as much as I enjoyed making it.

Description:

In this Walking sim, nothing is out of hand. Featuring 7 Endings, deep lore, and a retro/arcade Graphic style. You will have a pleasant and calm adventure with nothing but silence guiding you and your Ai companion. Just be careful with him he is a little... self-aware....anyways join our walking community today!

Disclaimer:

on certain devices, a warning window may appear. Even tho it does look worrying it's not bad, I have tried my best to figure out what is causing this but I can not.

. But I assure you that this game is not malicious. If it turns out to be I will take it down and you are allowed to slap me with a raw Salmon straight across the face.
